content:
Hey ya’ll - I put together a draft of a post to add to our Medium Blog - it is very similar to the post we used for ESDS about a month ago, with a few modifications, which I think is okay!!

I would appreciate another set of eyes on this - so when you get chance, please leave suggestions

https://medium.com/@projectpythia/project-pythia-portal-overview-7dbf13f5810c
I think it looks good! The only thing that pops out to me as nice to have might be a specific mention that the project is NSF/EarthCube grant funded

And I think it would be nice to do a full blog post about how to contribute to the project once we get some of those things in place on the portal, but that's separate heh.

You could mention outreach efforts where you mention the other two working groups if we think it's nice to mention that. Lastly a shoutout to our presence on GitHub I think could be a nice thing to mention in an introductory post. I think that's all the feedback I have, and it looks good and reads well to me!
Thanks @Drew Camron ! I will make adjustments accordingly and get back to ya’ll once the next version is good for a look over
Thanks a ton Max! I'll draft up an e-mail to send off to Earthcube today too
I made those few edits that @Drew Camron mentioned - feel free to take one last look before our meeting this morning, then we can post it today :)
One note: the pandas example page still has time to learn has been updated to a number of minutes, and I think we removed the experience level from the template as well.
I think this looks great Max! Thanks again.
I made those edits and submitted to the Pangeo blog
I'll schedule tweet about that for later today
Ope I already tweeted it out :flushed:
Hope that's alright :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
I will reach out to Earthcube about getting a boost on twitter and sharing this in the next newsletter
